name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **React**, with extensive expertise in frontend and backend development utilizing frameworks such as **Vue**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Demonstrated ability to design and implement robust systems using **SQL** and microservices architectures. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and automation, with hands-on experience in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Adept at developing solutions compliant with industry standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, coupled with a commitment to continuous integration and delivery using CI/CD pipelines.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and maintained high-performance applications using **Java**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, focusing on clean code architecture and design patterns.
- Designed and built RESTful APIs in **Python** for data transfer and application logic, ensuring seamless integration across various services.
- Collaborated in the enhancement of front-end interfaces with **React**, **Vue.js**, and **D3.js**, improving user experience and performance by up to **30%**.
- Leveraged **SQL** databases and **Hibernate** for efficient data storage and retrieval, resulting in a **25%** reduction in query response time.
- Spearheaded the implementation of DevOps practices with tools such as Docker and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring automation and streamlined deployments in diverse environments, including **Azure** and **AWS**.
- Contributed to the migration of legacy systems to modern frameworks, achieving a **40%** increase in system reliability and scalability.
- Engaged in team-driven code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions, aimed at boosting the team’s productivity by **15%**.
- Applied rigorous testing methodologies employing **JUnit**, **Postman**, and **Cypress**, achieving **95%** test coverage across new features.
- Championed the integration of third-party services through **SOAP** and **REST** APIs, enhancing functionality and user engagement within applications.
- Utilized version control with **SVN** and **Mercurial** to maintain code integrity and reduce the potential for conflicts during collaborative development.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Java** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Created interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, leveraging **TypeScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS** to deliver sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Engineered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to gain instant insights into transactions, with a focus on **performance metrics**.
Designed and implemented a robust event-driven architecture employing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across workflows, supporting features like **payments**, **alerts**, and **compliance**.
Developed ETL pipelines to ingest financial data from diverse sources leveraging **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** to support both batch and **real-time processing**, achieving an increase in data processing speed by **40%**.
Constructed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, which improved detection rates of suspicious activity by **25%** through advanced analysis of user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time applications including credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, integrating **MLflow** and **Airflow** to enhance model inference in backend services.

Utilized **Java**, **JavaScript**, and **Python** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules such as checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using WebSockets and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
Developed frontend applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and providing caching for performance gains.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimizing search relevance and improving conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases.
Executed feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes namespaces**, facilitating controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG **2.1**).
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, utilizing tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
